trailingComments.value:
*
 * Generate the dynamic business object type hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of business object type, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for business object type you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} typePath Current business object type path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} types Current business object type hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found business object types where the key is the business object type name.

leadingComments.value: Consider only JS files and subdirectories.

comments.value: This software comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. For details, see
the enclosed file COPYING for license information (GPL). If you
did not receive this file, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt.

*
 * Helper functions for business object type specific texts.
 *
 * @module Helpers/BusinessObjectTypeTexts

*
 * Business object type index array is computed by webpack at the time of the app build.
 *
 * @const

*
 * Generate the dynamic business object type hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of business object type, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for business object type you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} typePath Current business object type path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} types Current business object type hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found business object types where the key is the business object type name.
Consider only JS files and subdirectories.
For types named `index`, get the name of the parent folder, and shorten the path accordingly.
Skip types which do not reside in the specified base path.
Require registered types and include it in the same chunk as this code

*
 * Get the dynamic business object type object.
 *
 * @param {String} type Business object type.
  * @returns {Object} Hash of found business object types where the key is the business object type name.

*
 * Helper functions for business object type specific texts.
 *
 * @module Helpers/BusinessObjectTypeTexts

*
 * Business object type index array is computed by webpack at the time of the app build.
 *
 * @const

*
 * Generate the dynamic business object type hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of business object type, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for business object type you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} typePath Current business object type path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} types Current business object type hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found business object types where the key is the business object type name.
Consider only JS files and subdirectories.
For types named `index`, get the name of the parent folder, and shorten the path accordingly.
Skip types which do not reside in the specified base path.
Require registered types and include it in the same chunk as this code

*
 * Get the dynamic business object type object.
 *
 * @param {String} type Business object type.
  * @returns {Object} Hash of found business object types where the key is the business object type name.
